New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal became the youngest Indian batsman to post 75-plus runs in T20Is, breaking Rohit Sharma's 13-year-old record.
Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored an unbeaten 84 runs off 51 balls, leading India to a 9-wicket win.
Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill stitched a solid 165-run stand for the opening wicket, which is the third-highest partnership for any wicket for India in T20Is.
India's win against the West Indies was the sixth-biggest win in terms of wickets in T20Is.
